CustomField.formula: "This "+text(Report_Name__c) + " report subscription for "+Account_ID__r.Name+" will be uploaded to Salesforce on the defined day and repeat "+text(Recurrence__c)+". The report will be run for "+text(Outlet_Option__c)+" stores, and will be "+text(Report_Rollup__c)+" across all selected markets."
CustomField.label: Report Description
